Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades

Class CadesSignatureContainer

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.CadesSignatureContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CmsParent, SignatureContainer
public class CadesSignatureContainer extends Object implements SignatureContainer, CmsParent
Esta classe representa o contêiner de assinaturas que estão dentro do CMSSignedData. Implementa SignatureContainer e CmsParent.
